body:
Hey im Aurys, im an old OCN player but i dont play that anymore.
because my channel was based on OCN is switch it to Avicus.
if you want to see some good Avicus vids go check out my channel the nameis just Aurys xd.
im also looking for a team.
so if u want me in ure team u can ask it to me to join.
I want more ctw tho :3

title: Aurys is back on Avicus?!

replies.body: Welcome Back! You can join my team! Our goal is to try to win some matches in future tourneys or even win the tourney itself. We have 8 members and we aren't even a day old! :P

replies.body:
Welcome back Aurys, impressive number of subs you've got on your awesome channel there - 177! 

Questions!
  • What keys on a keyboard do you not use?
  • What question do you hate to answer?
  • How do you start a conversation?
See you around! c;

P.S. The toilets are down the hall, to the left.
